files.patch:
@@ -136,4 +136,0 @@
-        // filter out SCCS leftovers
-        if (file.getName().startsWith(","))
-            return;
-
@@ -704,5 +700,0 @@
-        // check for valid tag name, don't produce error message for the
-        // the SCCS sequence '%' 'W' '%'
-        if (name.startsWith("(#)"))
-            return;
-
@@ -1044,5 +1035,1 @@
-    static final String[] excludeNames = {
-        "SCCS", "Codemgr_wsdata", ".hg", "RCS", ".svn",
-        "DeletedFiles", "DELETED-FILES", "deleted_files",
-        "TemporarilyRemoved"
-    };
+    static final String[] excludeNames = { ".hg", ".git" };
@@ -1050,1 +1037,1 @@
-    // These are all of the error messages using in the finder.
+    // These are all the error messages used in the finder.

@@ -1,45 +0,0 @@

-#----------------------------------------------------------------------
-
-# 6590671: RegressionTestFinder should ignore , files
-$(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6590671.ok: $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/javatest.jar \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
-		$(TESTDIR)/6590671/T6590671.java \
-		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
-	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%)
-	$(MKDIR) -p $(@:%.ok=%)/test
-	$(CP) $(TESTDIR)/6590671/T6590671.java \
-		$(TESTDIR)/6590671/TEST.ROOT $(@:%.ok=%)/test
-	$(CP) $(@:%.ok=%)/test/T6590671.java $(@:%.ok=%)/test/,T6590671.java
-	JTHOME=$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR) $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg $(JTREG_OPTS) \
-		-w:$(@:%.ok=%)/work -r:$(@:%.ok=%)/report \
-		-v -jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
-		$(@:%.ok=%)/test
-	echo $@ passed at `date` > $@
-
-TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/T6590671.ok
-
